cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
💛 I give you light to see.
🌎 Plants need me to grow on Earth.

cosmos.question: I am in the sky at night, and I change my shape. Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm a crescent. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves like me!
🌑 I orbit the Earth.
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and water where we live. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I am your home.
💧 I have lots of water and land.
🌱 Plants grow on me.

cosmos.question: I am a bright light in the night sky that twinkles. I am very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am part of a big group called a galaxy.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.
🔥 I'm a giant ball of burning gas.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. People use lines to connect me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.
🌌 You can find me by looking at a star chart.
✨ The Big Dipper is a part of me.

cosmos.question: I am a big, swirling group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am huge and contain billions of stars.
🌌 The Milky Way is one.
💫 I come in different shapes, like spirals and ellipses.

cosmos.question: I'm a hot ball of gas that's far away, but I look small because I'm really, really distant. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me well.
🔥 I produce my own light and heat.

cosmos.question: I am a cold and rocky body that orbits the Sun, but I am much smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Sometimes I have a tail when I get close to the sun.
💥 I can create craters if I hit a planet.
🧱 I am made of rock and ice.

cosmos.question: I am a force that pulls everything towards each other, keeping us on the ground and planets in orbit. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree shows me.
🌎 I keep the Earth going around the Sun.
💪 I am strong but invisible.

cosmos.question: I am a special kind of trip that takes people or machines into space to explore. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Sometimes I involve rockets!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts go on me.
🌌 I help us learn about the stars and planets.

animal.question: I meow and love to play. I like to chase mice all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft paws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch and sometimes I chase the mail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🗣️ I say 'Woof!'
🐕 I am a loyal friend.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. I like to eat grass in a big field. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have black and white spots sometimes.
🐄 I live on a farm.
🌱 I eat grass.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. I have feathers and webbed feet and waddle around. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have a wide, flat bill.
💧 I like to play in the water.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I am a big animal with a long trunk. I live in Africa and eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I can pick things up with my nose.
🌍 I live in warm places.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots. I eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🌿 I eat leaves.
🏜️ I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop around and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat orange vegetables.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🤸 I can jump very high.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. I have a big mane. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a very strong animal.
🦁 I live in Africa.
🥩 I like to eat meat.

animal.question: I am green and have a long tail. I live in the water and have sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🐊 I am a reptile.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.
🐊 I can be found in swamps and rivers.

animal.question: I fly at night and can see in the dark. I live in caves and hang upside down. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I am a mammal that can fly.
🌙 I am nocturnal.
🍓 Some of us eat fruit and some of us eat bugs
